item.title: Running LLMs locally
item.description: Large Language Models, like the ones you chat with when you use ChatGPT, Anthropic Claude, Google Gemini, and Perplexity AI, are powerful tools for generating human-like text responses. Nowadays people are using them for editing purposes, writing, brainstorming, and even for generating code snippets. When used responsibly and critically as a tool to assist human creativity, they can be very helpful. Recently I spent some time playing with these models and I found them fascinating.
